ol.li:
Go to the Analyzer dashboard and select Data Design from the dropdown list, and click Reports.
A list of reports that you have permission to access displays.
Figure 2-1: Manage Reports Screen
The Manage Reports screen lets you find a report by name, last updated, history count, space, and by a report tag. Six icons provide additional information on each report letting you know if a report is a summary, its date range limit (timestamp), number of fields used as filters, models, chart type, and associated reports. For more details, see the table under .

Check the report that you want to view, click Run, and from the dropdown select View last run to obtain the latest report for viewing. For a sample report display, see , next.
Figure 2-2: Run Latest Report for Viewing
The View Last Run option will access which ever is the latest report from the reportâ€™s history; the last report run can be either an ad hoc or scheduled report. For details on other Run options, see .
